channel.title: Microsoft Office on Blake Niemyjski
channel.description: Recent content in Microsoft Office on Blake Niemyjski

item.title: Microsoft RTM's Office 2007 and releases Visual Studio Tools for Office Second Edition
item.description: This morning Microsoft RTM (Release to Manufacture) Office 2007 you can read the full details along with the information regarding how to get office 2007 retail version here. Be sure to visit the Microsoft Office Developer Center, for useful information about VSTO updates and news. Watch the Demo of Visual Studio 2005 Tools for the 2007 Microsoft Office System, Second Edition Download Microsoft Visual Studio 2005 Tools for the 2007 Microsoft Office System Source: Erika Ehrli
